bill.title: Telephone Solicitation Act; add cell phones and fax machines and extend repealer.
bill.description: An Act To Reenact And Amend Section 77-3-703, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Add Facsimile Communications And Cellular Telephones To The Mississippi Telephone Solicitation Act As A Prohibited Solicitation For Residential Subscribers Who Have Given Notice Of Their Objection To Such Facsimile And Cellular Communications; To Reenact And Amend Section 77-3-705, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Define Certain Terms; To Reenact And Amend Sections 77-3-707, 77-3-709, 77-3-711, 77-3-713, 77-3-715, 77-3-717, 77-3-719, 77-3-723, 77-3-725, 77-3-727, 77-3-729 And 77-3-731, Mississippi Code Of 1972, In Conformity Thereto; To Reenact Sections 77-3-721, 77-3-733 And 77-3-735, Mississippi Code Of 1972, In Conformity To The Change In Date Of Repeal In The Mississippi Telephone Solicitation Act; To Amend Section 77-3-737, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Extend The Date Of Repeal On The Mississippi Telephone Solicitation Act; And For Related Purposes.
